Allentown.Cedar Crest College: Cedar Crest College is a private liberal arts women's college in Allentown, Pennsylvania, in the United States. At the start of the 2015-2016 academic year, the college had 1,301 undergraduates (628 traditional age, 673 adult) and 203 graduate students. Men may pursue any master's degree, bachelor's degree, certification and/or certificate program offered through evening and/or weekend study and are welcome to study nursing and nuclear medicine by day.
